Comment: This response effectively builds upon the biblical examples provided, elaborating on the stories of the prodigal son and King David to underscore the significance of repentance and seeking forgiveness in the Christian faith. The additional depth and analysis enhance the understanding of repentance in practical terms for believers, aligning well with the concern provided. Great job in connecting the biblical examples to the practical application of repentance in personal lives from a Christian worldview.
